data.title: Jan. 16, 2024 school closures/delays
data.meta_description: Who’s closed, who’s delayed because of winter weather Tuesday? Here’s a list for West Alabama, last updated at 6:30 p.m. Jan. 15: K-12 schools Bibb County School District: Closed Jan. 16 Demopolis City Schools: Jan. 16 is a virtual day Fayette County School District: Closed Jan. 16 through Jan. 19 Greene County School System: Jan. 16 is a virtual day...
data.text:
Who’s closed, who’s delayed because of winter weather Tuesday?

Here’s a list for West Alabama, last updated at 6:30 p.m. Jan. 15:

K-12 schools

Bibb County School District: Closed Jan. 16

Demopolis City Schools: Jan. 16 is a virtual day

Fayette County School District: Closed Jan. 16 through Jan. 19

Greene County School System: Jan. 16 is a virtual day

Hale County School District: Closed Jan. 16 and Jan. 17

Jasper City Schools: Closed Jan. 16 and Jan. 17

Pickens County Schools: No notice as of 6:30 p.m. Jan. 15

Tuscaloosa City Schools: Closed Jan. 16

Tuscaloosa County School System: Schools and offices closed Jan. 16 and Jan. 17

Walker County Schools: Closed Jan. 16 and Jan. 17

College/universities

Shelton State Community College: Closed Jan. 16 and Jan. 17

Stillman College: Closed Jan. 16 and Jan. 17

University of Alabama: Closed Jan. 16

University of West Alabama: Closed Jan. 16 and Jan. 17
